text:
USD/EUR spot = $1.312 USD/EUR 90-day forward = $1.320
The (90-day) forward premium or discount on the euro = forward/spot — 1 =
1.320/1.312 - 1 = 0.609%. Because this is positive, it is interpreted as a forward
premium on the euro of 0.609%. Since we have the forward rate for 3 months, we could
annualize the discount simply by multiplying by (12/3=) 4.
